hero.title: Construction projects delivered with precision and reliability.
hero.summary: I build practical, high-quality interior spaces with a strong focus on framing accuracy, schedule discipline, and clean handoffs between trades.
hero.imageAlt: Completed premium interior construction project with warm lighting

about.title: About Me
about.body: I'm a construction professional focused on interior fit-outs, event builds, and detail-oriented site execution. My approach combines technical framing knowledge with real-world coordination to keep projects moving safely and efficiently.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you need support on fit-out or event construction projects, let's connect.
